mapper.select: select * from payment join member on payment.idx = member.idx where username = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into payment (IDX, STATE, MEMBER_IDX, VEHICLE_IDX, INSURANCE_IDX, COUPON_IDX, FINAL_PRICE, PAID_TIME, START_DATE, END_DATE, CANCEL_DATE, RENT_LOCATION,RETURN_LOCATION, IS_MEMBER ) values (payment_seq.nextval,0,#{memberIdx},#{vehicleIdx}, #{insurance},0, #{finalprice}, #{paidtime}, #{startDate}, #{endDate},'',#{rentLocation},#{returnLocation}, #{ismember})
